Name: Greek Piña Colada
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: BLEND ingredients crushed ice, pour into glass and serve immediately with straws.
Review: A yoghurt and rum based pineapple and coconut drink, and if your blender is sufficiently powerful, with tiny fragments of pineapple shrapnel.
History: Created in 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Piña Colada cocktail history
